item.title: Let spells require items to cast
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

if (magicID == 1152) { // Wind Strike if(playerHasItemAmount(4718,1)) { stillgfx(80, absY, absX); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); hitDiff = misc.random(2); } else { sendMessage("You need Dharok's Great Axe to cast this spell!"); } }

and if you wanted that axe to get deleted

if (magicID == 1152) { // Wind Strike if(playerHasItemAmount(4718,1)) { stillgfx(80, absY, absX); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); hitDiff = misc.random(2); deleteItem(4718, getItemSlot(4718), 1); } else { sendMessage("You need Dharok's Great Axe to cast this spell!"); } }

btw none of you need the playerlevel requirement because everyone can cast it …

oh and masterhelper that last one wouldn’t require a gaxe to cast seeing as weather you have the gaxe or not doesn’t make a difference

if(player.hasItem("4748") && hasItem("4718") {} see the problem ?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

if (magicID == 1152) { // Wind Strike
if(playerLevel[6] >= 0) {
stillgfx(80, absY, absX);
stillgfx(179, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
hitDiff = misc.random(2); //Damage
if(player.hasItem(“4748”) && hasItem(“4718”) {
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need a magic lvl of 0 for this spell !”);
}
}

That would work for my oldest source i have soz if doesn’t work.

Happy to help

item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

if (magicID == 1152) { // Wind Strike if(playerLevel[6] >= 0 && playerHasItemAmount(4718,1) == true) { stillgfx(80, absY, absX); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); hitDiff = misc.random(2); //Damage } else { sendMessage("You need Dharok's Great Axe to cast this spell!"); }

item.title: Let spells require items to cast
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

if (magicID == 1152) { // Wind Strike { if(playerLevel[6] >= 0) { if((playerHasItemAmount(4718, 1)==false) sendMessage("You need a greataxe to cast this spell!"); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(4718, 1)==true) { stillgfx(80, absY, absX); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); hitDiff = misc.random(2); //Damage } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 0) { sendMessage("You need a magic lvl of 0 for this spell !"); } }

Try it.

item.title: Let spells require items to cast
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

[quote=“0wnz0r, post:6, topic:115518”]Thank you newb, And guyz… Do you care about it?
EDIT: It’s not working.[/quote]

I suggest that you only have ONE itme needed.
Makes it easier.
So, if you wanted Great Axe…

if (magicID == 1152) { // Wind Strike if(playerLevel[6] >= 0 && playerHasItemAmount(4718,1) == true) { stillgfx(80, absY, absX); stillgfx(179, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); hitDiff = misc.random(2); //Damage } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 0) { sendMessage("You need a magic lvl of 0 for this spell !"); { else if (playerHasItemAmount(4718,1) == false) { sendMessage("You must have a greataxe!"); } }
